name: SalesforceRest
description: The Salesforce connector allows you to work with records in Salesforce, a web-based service that allows organizations to manage contact relationship management (CRM) data. You can use the Salesforce connector to create, query, retrieve, update, and delete records in your organization's Salesforce data. The connector uses the Slaesforce REST API to interact with Salesforce.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Initialize Salesforce connector (OAuth 2.0 or BasicAuth/SOAP).

operations.name: callWithRetry
operations.description: Internal template to wrap a call with retry logic.

operations.name: callOptions
operations.description: Internal template for HTTP verbs (GET, POST, etc.).

operations.name: search
operations.description: Search Salesforce records using SOSL-style search string.

operations.name: getUserInformation
operations.description: Retrieve details for a specific Salesforce user.

operations.name: resetPassword
operations.description: Reset a user’s password (REST).

operations.name: setPassword
operations.description: Set a user’s password (REST).

operations.name: query
operations.description: Run a SOQL query (active/deleted records).

operations.name: create
operations.description: Create a single sObject record.

operations.name: createBulk
operations.description: Create multiple sObject records in one request.

operations.name: createTree
operations.description: Create nested related sObject records (tree).

operations.name: update
operations.description: Update fields on an existing sObject record.

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Delete an sObject record.

operations.name: upsert
operations.description: Create or update a record via external ID.

operations.name: getDeleted
operations.description: List records deleted in a time window.

operations.name: getUpdated
operations.description: List records updated in a time window.

operations.name: describeGlobal
operations.description: List all available sObjects.

operations.name: describeSObject
operations.description: Retrieve metadata for a specific sObject.

operations.name: retrieveSObject
operations.description: Retrieve a specific record by ID.

operations.name: compositeBatch
operations.description: Submit up to 25 sub-requests in a batch call.

operations.name: compositeGraph
operations.description: Execute ordered, interdependent sub-requests as a graph.

operations.name: compositeRequest
operations.description: Execute composite REST requests with inter-request references.

operations.name: abortJob
operations.description: Abort a Bulk API v2 ingest job.

operations.name: createJob
operations.description: Create a Bulk API v2 ingest job.

operations.name: closeJob
operations.description: Close a Bulk API v2 ingest job.

operations.name: deleteJob
operations.description: Delete a Bulk API v2 ingest job.

operations.name: getAllJobInfo
operations.description: List ingest jobs (Bulk APIs).

operations.name: getFailedResults
operations.description: Download failed record results for an ingest job.

operations.name: getJobInfo
operations.description: Retrieve metadata for a specific ingest job.

operations.name: getSuccessfulResults
operations.description: Download successful record results for an ingest job.

operations.name: getUnprocessedResults
operations.description: Download unprocessed record results for an ingest job.

operations.name: uploadJobData
operations.description: Upload CSV data to an ingest job.

operations.name: createQueryJob
operations.description: Create a Bulk API v2 query or queryAll job.

operations.name: abortQueryJob
operations.description: Abort a Bulk API v2 query job.

operations.name: deleteQueryJob
operations.description: Delete a Bulk API v2 query job.

operations.name: getQueryJobInfo
operations.description: Retrieve metadata for a specific query job.

operations.name: getAllQueryJobInfo
operations.description: List query jobs (Bulk APIs).

operations.name: getQueryJobResults
operations.description: Download results (CSV or file) from a query job.

operations.name: soapConvertLead
operations.description: Convert Lead(s) to Account/Contact/(Opportunity) via SOAP.

operations.name: soapCreate
operations.description: Create records via SOAP API.

operations.name: soapDelete
operations.description: Delete records via SOAP API.

operations.name: soapDescribeGlobal
operations.description: List all objects (SOAP).

operations.name: soapDescribeSObject
operations.description: Describe one object (SOAP).

operations.name: soapDescribeSObjects
operations.description: Describe multiple objects (SOAP).

operations.name: soapEmptyRecycleBin
operations.description: Permanently delete records in Recycle Bin (SOAP).

operations.name: soapFindDuplicates
operations.description: Find duplicate records (SOAP).

operations.name: soapFindDuplicatesByIds
operations.description: Find duplicates by record IDs (SOAP).

operations.name: soapGetDeleted
operations.description: Get IDs of deleted records in time range (SOAP).

operations.name: soapGetServerTimestamp
operations.description: Get current Salesforce server timestamp (SOAP).

operations.name: soapGetUpdated
operations.description: Get IDs of updated records in time range (SOAP).

operations.name: soapGetUserInfo
operations.description: Get current session user info (SOAP).

operations.name: soapLogout
operations.description: End current SOAP session.

operations.name: soapMerge
operations.description: Merge up to three records (SOAP).

operations.name: soapQuery
operations.description: Run SOQL query (SOAP).

operations.name: soapQueryAll
operations.description: Run SOQL query incl. deleted/archived (SOAP).

operations.name: soapQueryMore
operations.description: Retrieve next batch of SOAP query results.

operations.name: soapResetPassword
operations.description: Reset a user’s password (SOAP).

operations.name: soapRetrieve
operations.description: Retrieve specified fields for record IDs (SOAP).

operations.name: soapSearch
operations.description: Run SOSL text search (SOAP).

operations.name: soapSendEmail
operations.description: Send single or mass email immediately (SOAP).

operations.name: soapSendEmailMessage
operations.description: Send draft EmailMessage records (SOAP).

operations.name: soapSetPassword
operations.description: Set a user’s password value (SOAP).

operations.name: soapUndelete
operations.description: Restore deleted records from Recycle Bin (SOAP).

operations.name: soapUpdate
operations.description: Update existing records (SOAP).

operations.name: soapUpsert
operations.description: Create/update records via external ID (SOAP).

operations.name: init
operations.description: Initial configuration file for salesforce rest connector

operations.name: callWithRetry
operations.description: Templating the retry call

operations.name: callOptions
operations.description: Templating the http call types GET, POST, etc.

operations.name: describeGlobal
operations.description: Lists the available objects and their metadata for your organization’s data

operations.name: describeSObject
operations.description: Completely describes the individual metadata at all levels for the specified object

operations.name: listResourcesByApiVersion
operations.description: Lists available resources for the specified API version

operations.name: sObjectBasicInfo
operations.description: Describes the individual metadata for the specified object

operations.name: sObjectRows
operations.description: Accesses records based on the specified object ID

operations.name: listAvailableApiVersion
operations.description: List summary information about each REST API version currently available.

operations.name: sObjectPlatformAction
operations.description: PlatformAction is a virtual read-only object that enables you to query for actions—such as standard and custom buttons, quick actions, and productivity actions—that should be displayed in a UI, given a user, a context, device format, and a record ID.

operations.name: listOrganizationLimits
operations.description: List the organization limits

operations.name: sObjectRowsByExternalId
operations.description: SObject Rows by External ID resource to retrieve records with a specific external ID

operations.name: returnHeadersOfSObjectRowsByExternalId
operations.description: Return headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject Rows by External ID resource.

operations.name: viewRelevantItems
operations.description: Retrieves the current user’s most relevant items that include up to 50 of the most recently viewed or updated records for each object in the user’s global search scope.

operations.name: create
operations.description: Insert sObject(s) synapse library

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Delete sObject(s) synapse library

operations.name: getDeleted
operations.description: Retrieves the list of individual records that have been deleted within the given timespan for the specified object.

operations.name: getUpdated
operations.description: Retrieves the list of individual records that have been updated within the given timespan for the specified object.

operations.name: update
operations.description: Update or update sObject(s) synapse library

operations.name: recentlyViewedItem
operations.description: Gets the most recently accessed items that were viewed or referenced by the current user

operations.name: retrieveFieldValues
operations.description: Retrieve specific field values from a record

operations.name: createMultipleRecords
operations.description: Insert multiple sObject(s)

operations.name: createNestedRecords
operations.description: Insert nested sObject(s)

operations.name: retrieveFieldValuesFromExternalObject
operations.description: Retrieve specific field values from an External Object

operations.name: retrieveStandardFieldValuesFromExternalObjectWithExternalId
operations.description: Retrieve specific Standard field values from an External Object using External Id

operations.name: upsert
operations.description: Updating a record or Insert a new Record if there is no record associate with the Id using External ID.

operations.name: createUsingExternalId
operations.description: Creating a new record based on the field values included in the request body. This resource does not require the use of an external ID field.

operations.name: deleteUsingExternalId
operations.description: Deleting a record based on the value of the specified external ID field.

operations.name: createUsingSpecificSObjectQuickAction
operations.description: Creating a record via the specified quick action based on the field values included in the request body

operations.name: getRecordsUsingRelationships
operations.description: Gets a record based on the specified object, record ID, and relationship field

operations.name: updateUsingRelationships
operations.description: Updates a parent record based on the specified object, record ID, and relationship field name

operations.name: deleteUsingRelationships
operations.description: Deletes a parent record based on the specified object, record ID, and relationship field name

operations.name: getObjectRecordCounts
operations.description: Lists information about object record counts in your organization.

operations.name: createUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Creates records using sObject collections. Can add up to 200 records

operations.name: deleteRecordsUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Deletes records using sObject collections. Can delete up to 200 records

operations.name: getRecordsUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Gets one or more records of the same object type using sObject collections.

operations.name: getRecordsWithARequestBodyUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Gets one or more records of the same object type using sObject collections with a request body.

operations.name: updateRecordsUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Updates records using sObject collections. Can update up to 200 records.

operations.name: upsertRecordsUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Either creates or updates (upsert) up to 200 records based on an external ID field using sObject collections

operations.name: createUsingQuickAction
operations.description: Creates a record via a quick action.

operations.name: getUserInformation
operations.description: Get User Information From Salesforce.

operations.name: resetPassword
operations.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

operations.name: setPassword
operations.description: Set new password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

operations.name: getUserPasswordExpirationStatus
operations.description: Gets a user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID

operations.name: returnHeadersForUserPassword
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject User Password resource.

operations.name: getSelfServiceUserPasswordExpirationStatus
operations.description: Retrieves a self-service user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID.

operations.name: resetSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific self-service.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject Self-Service User Password resource.

operations.name: setSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Sets a self-service user’s password based on the specified user ID. The password provided in the request body replaces the user’s existing password.

operations.name: listApprovals
operations.description: Get the List of Approvals.

operations.name: returnHeadersForApprovals
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the listApprovals operation.

operations.name: submitApproveOrRejectApprovals
operations.description: Submits a particular record if that entity supports an approval process and one has already been defined. Records can be approved and rejected if the current user is an assigned approver.

operations.name: listViews
operations.description: Returns the list of list views for the specified sObject, including the ID and other basic information about each list view

operations.name: listViewById
operations.description: get basic information for a specific list view by ID

operations.name: recentListViews
operations.description: Returns the list of recently used list views for the given sObject type

operations.name: describeListViewById
operations.description: Returns detailed information about a list view, including the ID, the columns, and the SOQL query.

operations.name: listViewResults
operations.description: Executes the SOQL query for the list view and returns the resulting data and presentation information.

operations.name: query
operations.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve

operations.name: queryPerformanceFeedback
operations.description: Retrieving query performance feedback without executing the query

operations.name: listviewQueryPerformanceFeedback
operations.description: Retrieving query performance feedback on a report or list view

operations.name: queryMore
operations.description: Retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large

operations.name: queryAll
operations.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve details with deleted records

operations.name: queryAllMore
operations.description: For retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large

operations.name: sObjectAction
operations.description: Return a specific object’s actions as well as global actions

operations.name: getSpecificQuickAction
operations.description: Return a specific action for an object

operations.name: quickActions
operations.description: Returns a list of global actions

operations.name: getDescribeSpecificAction
operations.description: Return a specific action’s descriptive detail

operations.name: getDefaultValueOfAction
operations.description: Return a specific action’s default values, including default field values

operations.name: returnHeadersForDescribeSpecificAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDescribeSpecificAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForQuickAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the quickActions operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificQuickAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForDefaultValueOfAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDefaultValueOfAction operation

operations.name: getDefaultValueOfActionById
operations.description: Returns the default values for an action specific to the context_id object

operations.name: returnHeadersForDefaultValueOfActionById
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDefaultValueOfActionById operation

operations.name: search
operations.description: Executes the specified SOSL search

operations.name: searchScopeAndOrder
operations.description: Returns an ordered list of objects in the default global search scope of a logged-in user.

operations.name: searchResultLayout
operations.description: Returns search result layout information for the objects in the query string

operations.name: searchSuggestedRecords
operations.description: Returns a list of suggested records whose names match the user’s search string

operations.name: searchSuggestedArticleTitle
operations.description: Returns a list of Salesforce Knowledge articles whose titles match the user’s search query string

operations.name: searchSuggestedQueries
operations.description: Returns a list of suggested searches based on the user’s query string text matching searches that other users have performed in Salesforce Knowledge

operations.name: sObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of layouts and descriptions, including for actions for a specific object.

operations.name: compactLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for multiple objects.

operations.name: sObjectCompactLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for a specific object.

operations.name: sObjectNamedLayouts
operations.description: Retrieves information about alternate named layouts for a given object.

operations.name: globalSObjectLayouts
operations.description: To return descriptions of global publisher layouts.

operations.name: sObjectApprovalLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of approval layouts for a specified object

operations.name: sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
operations.description: Returns an approval layout for a named approval process on a specified object.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectApprovalLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayouts operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectCompactLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectCompactLayouts operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayouts operation

operations.name: sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
operations.description: Retrieves lists of page layouts and their descriptions for objects that have more than one record type defined.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForGlobalSObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the globalSObjectLayouts operation

operations.name: listItemsInMenu
operations.description: Returns a list of items in either the Salesforce app drop-down menu or the Salesforce1 navigation menu.

operations.name: tabs
operations.description: Returns a list of all tabs.

operations.name: themes
operations.description: Gets the list of icons and colors used by themes in the Salesforce application.

operations.name: listAppMenuTypes
operations.description: Retrieves a list of App Menu types in the Salesforce app dropdown menu.

operations.name: listAppMenuItems
operations.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce Lightning dropdown menu.

operations.name: listAppMenuMobileItems
operations.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce mobile app for Android and iOS and the mobile web navigation menu.

operations.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuItems
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuItems operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuMobileItems
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuMobileItems operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForTabs
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the tabs operation.

operations.name: getListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieving a list of general action types for the current organization

operations.name: getSpecificListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieving a list of standard actions for the current organization

operations.name: getAttributeOfSpecificAction
operations.description: Retrieving the details of a given attributes of a single standard action.

operations.name: returnHTTPHeadersForListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the getListOfAction operation

operations.name: returnHTTPHeadersForSpecificListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificListOfAction operation

operations.name: listProcessRules
operations.description: Get the List of Process Rules.

operations.name: getSpecificProcessRule
operations.description: get the metadata for a specific sObject Process rule

operations.name: getSpecificProcessRuleList
operations.description: Gets all active workflow rules for an sObject.

operations.name: returnHeadersForProcessRules
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the listProcessRules operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRule
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRule operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRuleList
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRuleList operation.

operations.name: triggerProcessRules
operations.description: Triggers all active workflow rules. All rules associated with the specified ID are evaluated, regardless of the evaluation criteria. All IDs must be for records on the same object.

operations.name: getBlobBodyForAttachmentRecord
operations.description: Retrieving blob body for an Attachment record

operations.name: getBlobBodyForDocumentRecord
operations.description: Retrieving blob body for a Document record

operations.name: getBlobDataForSpecificObject
operations.description: Retrieves the specified blob field from an individual record and returns it as binary data

operations.name: getSObjectRichTextImage
operations.description: Retrieves the specified image data from a specific rich text area field in a given record

operations.name: describeEventMonitoring
operations.description: Use the SObject Describe resource to retrieve all metadata for an object, including information about fields, URLs, and child relationships.

operations.name: queryEventMonitoringData
operations.description: Use the Query resource to retrieve field values from a record. Specify the fields you want to retrieve in the fields parameter and use the GET method of the resource.

operations.name: getEventMonitoringContentFromRecord
operations.description: Retrieves event monitoring content in binary format.

operations.name: getReport
operations.description: Returns the report for a specific report id.

operations.name: listCompositeResources
operations.description: Retrieves a list of URIs for other composite resources.

operations.name: sendMultipleRequestsUsingComposite
operations.description: Executes a series of REST API requests in a single call.

operations.name: compositeGraph
operations.description: Submit composite graph operations.

operations.name: compositeBatch
operations.description: Executes up to 25 subrequests in a single request.

operations.name: createProductSchedules
operations.description: Establishes or reestablishes a product schedule with multiple installments for an opportunity product.

operations.name: deleteProductSchedules
operations.description: Deletes all installments in a revenue or quantity schedule for opportunity products.

operations.name: getProductSchedules
operations.description: Retrieves revenue and quantity schedules for opportunity products.

operations.name: consentDetailsOnSingleAction
operations.description: Retrieves consent details based on a single action, like email or track, across specific consent management objects when the records have a lookup relationship.

operations.name: consentDetailsOnMultipleAction
operations.description: Retrieves consent details based on multiple actions, like email and track, across specific consent management objects when the records have a lookup relationship.

operations.name: embeddedServiceConfig
operations.description: Retrieves the values for your Embedded Service deployment configuration, including the branding colors, font, and site URL

operations.name: returnHeadersForEmbeddedServiceConfig
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the embeddedServiceConfig operation.

operations.name: listKnowledgeRESTApis
operations.description: Retrieves knowledge support REST APIs that allow both authorized and guest users to retrieve the user’s visible data categories and their associated articles.

operations.name: listDataCategoryGroups
operations.description: Retrieves data category groups that are visible to the current user.

operations.name: getDataCategoryDetails
operations.description: Retrieves data category details and the child categories by a given category.

operations.name: listArticles
operations.description: Retrieves a page of online articles for the given language and category through either search or query.

operations.name: getArticleDetails
operations.description: Retrieves all online article fields, accessible to the user.

operations.name: getKnowledgeLanguageSettings
operations.description: Retrieves the existing Knowledge language settings, including the default knowledge language and a list of supported Knowledge language information.

operations.name: platformEventSchemaByEventName
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for an event name

operations.name: platformEventSchemaByEventNameAndSpecifiedPayloadFormat
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for an event name in specified payload format

operations.name: platformEventSchemaBySchemaId
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for a schema ID

operations.name: platformEventSchemaBySchemaIdAndSpecifiedPayloadFormat
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for a schema ID in specified payload format

operations.name: compileDataForPortabilityRequest
operations.description: Aggregates your data subject's personally identifiable information (PII) into one file and sends a response with a URL to download the file, a policy file ID, and information on the objects and fields you selected when creating the policy.

operations.name: statusOfPortabilityRequest
operations.description: Retrieves the status of the request done by compileDataForPortabilityRequest operation.

operations.name: addOrChangeTranslationOfSurveyField
operations.description: Add or change the translated value of the survey field if a survey field can be translated or is already translated into a particular language.

operations.name: addOrUpdateTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: If one or more survey fields can be translated or are already translated, adds or updates the translated values of the survey fields in the languages into which survey fields can be translated.

operations.name: deleteTheTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
operations.description: Deletes the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

operations.name: deleteTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: Delete the translated values of multiple survey fields after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.

operations.name: getTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
operations.description: Retrieves the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

operations.name: getTranslatedValuesOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: Retrieves the translated values of multiple survey fields in the translated languages after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.

operations.name: listSchedulerRESTResourcesAndURIs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of available Salesforce Scheduler REST resources and corresponding URIs.

operations.name: listAppointmentSlots
operations.description: Retrieves a list of available appointment time slots for a resource based on given work type group or work type and service territories.

operations.name: listAppointmentCandidates
operations.description: Retrieves a list of service resources (appointment candidates) based on work type group or work type and service territories.

operations.name: upsertRecordsUsingSObjectCollections
operations.description: Either creates or updates (upsert) up to 200 records based on an external ID field using sObject collections

operations.name: createUsingQuickAction
operations.description: Creates a record via a quick action.

operations.name: getUserInformation
operations.description: Get User Information From Salesforce.

operations.name: resetPassword
operations.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

operations.name: setPassword
operations.description: Set new password for Salesforce account for a specific User.

operations.name: getUserPasswordExpirationStatus
operations.description: Gets a user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID

operations.name: returnHeadersForUserPassword
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject User Password resource.

operations.name: getSelfServiceUserPasswordExpirationStatus
operations.description: Retrieves a self-service user’s password expiration status based on the specified user ID.

operations.name: resetSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Reset Password for Salesforce account for a specific self-service.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by sending a GET request to the sObject Self-Service User Password resource.

operations.name: setSelfServiceUserPassword
operations.description: Sets a self-service user’s password based on the specified user ID. The password provided in the request body replaces the user’s existing password.

operations.name: listApprovals
operations.description: Get the List of Approvals.

operations.name: returnHeadersForApprovals
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the listApprovals operation.

operations.name: submitApproveOrRejectApprovals
operations.description: Submits a particular record if that entity supports an approval process and one has already been defined. Records can be approved and rejected if the current user is an assigned approver.

operations.name: listViews
operations.description: Returns the list of list views for the specified sObject, including the ID and other basic information about each list view

operations.name: listViewById
operations.description: get basic information for a specific list view by ID

operations.name: recentListViews
operations.description: Returns the list of recently used list views for the given sObject type

operations.name: describeListViewById
operations.description: Returns detailed information about a list view, including the ID, the columns, and the SOQL query.

operations.name: listViewResults
operations.description: Executes the SOQL query for the list view and returns the resulting data and presentation information.

operations.name: query
operations.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve

operations.name: queryPerformanceFeedback
operations.description: Retrieving query performance feedback without executing the query

operations.name: listviewQueryPerformanceFeedback
operations.description: Retrieving query performance feedback on a report or list view

operations.name: queryMore
operations.description: Retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large

operations.name: queryAll
operations.description: Executes the specified SOQL query to retrieve details with deleted records

operations.name: queryAllMore
operations.description: For retrieving additional query results if the initial results are too large

operations.name: sObjectAction
operations.description: Return a specific object’s actions as well as global actions

operations.name: getSpecificQuickAction
operations.description: Return a specific action for an object

operations.name: quickActions
operations.description: Returns a list of global actions

operations.name: getDescribeSpecificAction
operations.description: Return a specific action’s descriptive detail

operations.name: getDefaultValueOfAction
operations.description: Return a specific action’s default values, including default field values

operations.name: returnHeadersForDescribeSpecificAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDescribeSpecificAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForQuickAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the quickActions operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificQuickAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificAction operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForDefaultValueOfAction
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDefaultValueOfAction operation

operations.name: getDefaultValueOfActionById
operations.description: Returns the default values for an action specific to the context_id object

operations.name: returnHeadersForDefaultValueOfActionById
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getDefaultValueOfActionById operation

operations.name: search
operations.description: Executes the specified SOSL search

operations.name: searchScopeAndOrder
operations.description: Returns an ordered list of objects in the default global search scope of a logged-in user.

operations.name: searchResultLayout
operations.description: Returns search result layout information for the objects in the query string

operations.name: searchSuggestedRecords
operations.description: Returns a list of suggested records whose names match the user’s search string

operations.name: searchSuggestedArticleTitle
operations.description: Returns a list of Salesforce Knowledge articles whose titles match the user’s search query string

operations.name: searchSuggestedQueries
operations.description: Returns a list of suggested searches based on the user’s query string text matching searches that other users have performed in Salesforce Knowledge

operations.name: sObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of layouts and descriptions, including for actions for a specific object.

operations.name: compactLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for multiple objects.

operations.name: sObjectCompactLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of compact layouts for a specific object.

operations.name: sObjectNamedLayouts
operations.description: Retrieves information about alternate named layouts for a given object.

operations.name: globalSObjectLayouts
operations.description: To return descriptions of global publisher layouts.

operations.name: sObjectApprovalLayouts
operations.description: Returns a list of approval layouts for a specified object

operations.name: sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
operations.description: Returns an approval layout for a named approval process on a specified object.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectApprovalLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayouts operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectApprovalLayoutsForSpecifiedApprovalProcess operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectCompactLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectCompactLayouts operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayouts operation

operations.name: sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
operations.description: Retrieves lists of page layouts and their descriptions for objects that have more than one record type defined.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the sObjectLayoutsForObjectWithMultipleRecordTypes operation

operations.name: returnHeadersForGlobalSObjectLayouts
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the globalSObjectLayouts operation

operations.name: listItemsInMenu
operations.description: Returns a list of items in either the Salesforce app drop-down menu or the Salesforce1 navigation menu.

operations.name: tabs
operations.description: Returns a list of all tabs.

operations.name: themes
operations.description: Gets the list of icons and colors used by themes in the Salesforce application.

operations.name: listAppMenuTypes
operations.description: Retrieves a list of App Menu types in the Salesforce app dropdown menu.

operations.name: listAppMenuItems
operations.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce Lightning dropdown menu.

operations.name: listAppMenuMobileItems
operations.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce mobile app for Android and iOS and the mobile web navigation menu.

operations.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuItems
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuItems operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuMobileItems
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuMobileItems operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForTabs
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the tabs operation.

operations.name: getListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieving a list of general action types for the current organization

operations.name: getSpecificListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieving a list of standard actions for the current organization

operations.name: getAttributeOfSpecificAction
operations.description: Retrieving the details of a given attributes of a single standard action.

operations.name: returnHTTPHeadersForListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the getListOfAction operation

operations.name: returnHTTPHeadersForSpecificListOfAction
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificListOfAction operation

operations.name: listProcessRules
operations.description: Get the List of Process Rules.

operations.name: getSpecificProcessRule
operations.description: get the metadata for a specific sObject Process rule

operations.name: getSpecificProcessRuleList
operations.description: Gets all active workflow rules for an sObject.

operations.name: returnHeadersForProcessRules
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the listProcessRules operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRule
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRule operation.

operations.name: returnHeadersForSpecificProcessRuleList
operations.description: Returns only the headers that are returned by the getSpecificProcessRuleList operation.

operations.name: triggerProcessRules
operations.description: Triggers all active workflow rules. All rules associated with the specified ID are evaluated, regardless of the evaluation criteria. All IDs must be for records on the same object.

operations.name: getBlobBodyForAttachmentRecord
operations.description: Retrieving blob body for an Attachment record

operations.name: getBlobBodyForDocumentRecord
operations.description: Retrieving blob body for a Document record

operations.name: getBlobDataForSpecificObject
operations.description: Retrieves the specified blob field from an individual record and returns it as binary data

operations.name: getSObjectRichTextImage
operations.description: Retrieves the specified image data from a specific rich text area field in a given record

operations.name: describeEventMonitoring
operations.description: Use the SObject Describe resource to retrieve all metadata for an object, including information about fields, URLs, and child relationships.

operations.name: queryEventMonitoringData
operations.description: Use the Query resource to retrieve field values from a record. Specify the fields you want to retrieve in the fields parameter and use the GET method of the resource.

operations.name: getEventMonitoringContentFromRecord
operations.description: Retrieves event monitoring content in binary format.

operations.name: getReport
operations.description: Returns the report for a specific report id.

operations.name: listCompositeResources
operations.description: Retrieves a list of URIs for other composite resources.

operations.name: sendMultipleRequestsUsingComposite
operations.description: Executes a series of REST API requests in a single call.

operations.name: compositeGraph
operations.description: Submit composite graph operations.

operations.name: compositeBatch
operations.description: Executes up to 25 subrequests in a single request.

operations.name: createProductSchedules
operations.description: Establishes or reestablishes a product schedule with multiple installments for an opportunity product.

operations.name: deleteProductSchedules
operations.description: Deletes all installments in a revenue or quantity schedule for opportunity products.

operations.name: getProductSchedules
operations.description: Retrieves revenue and quantity schedules for opportunity products.

operations.name: consentDetailsOnSingleAction
operations.description: Retrieves consent details based on a single action, like email or track, across specific consent management objects when the records have a lookup relationship.

operations.name: consentDetailsOnMultipleAction
operations.description: Retrieves consent details based on multiple actions, like email and track, across specific consent management objects when the records have a lookup relationship.

operations.name: embeddedServiceConfig
operations.description: Retrieves the values for your Embedded Service deployment configuration, including the branding colors, font, and site URL

operations.name: returnHeadersForEmbeddedServiceConfig
operations.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the embeddedServiceConfig operation.

operations.name: listKnowledgeRESTApis
operations.description: Retrieves knowledge support REST APIs that allow both authorized and guest users to retrieve the user’s visible data categories and their associated articles.

operations.name: listDataCategoryGroups
operations.description: Retrieves data category groups that are visible to the current user.

operations.name: getDataCategoryDetails
operations.description: Retrieves data category details and the child categories by a given category.

operations.name: listArticles
operations.description: Retrieves a page of online articles for the given language and category through either search or query.

operations.name: getArticleDetails
operations.description: Retrieves all online article fields, accessible to the user.

operations.name: getKnowledgeLanguageSettings
operations.description: Retrieves the existing Knowledge language settings, including the default knowledge language and a list of supported Knowledge language information.

operations.name: platformEventSchemaByEventName
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for an event name

operations.name: platformEventSchemaByEventNameAndSpecifiedPayloadFormat
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for an event name in specified payload format

operations.name: platformEventSchemaBySchemaId
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for a schema ID

operations.name: platformEventSchemaBySchemaIdAndSpecifiedPayloadFormat
operations.description: Retrieves the definition of a platform event for a schema ID in specified payload format

operations.name: compileDataForPortabilityRequest
operations.description: Aggregates your data subject's personally identifiable information (PII) into one file and sends a response with a URL to download the file, a policy file ID, and information on the objects and fields you selected when creating the policy.

operations.name: statusOfPortabilityRequest
operations.description: Retrieves the status of the request done by compileDataForPortabilityRequest operation.

operations.name: addOrChangeTranslationOfSurveyField
operations.description: Add or change the translated value of the survey field if a survey field can be translated or is already translated into a particular language.

operations.name: addOrUpdateTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: If one or more survey fields can be translated or are already translated, adds or updates the translated values of the survey fields in the languages into which survey fields can be translated.

operations.name: deleteTheTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
operations.description: Deletes the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

operations.name: deleteTranslatedValueOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: Delete the translated values of multiple survey fields after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.

operations.name: getTranslatedValueOfSurveyField
operations.description: Retrieves the translated value of the survey field after a survey field is translated into a particular language.

operations.name: getTranslatedValuesOfMultipleSurveyFieldsInOneOrMoreLanguages
operations.description: Retrieves the translated values of multiple survey fields in the translated languages after survey fields are translated into one or more languages.

operations.name: listSchedulerRESTResourcesAndURIs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of available Salesforce Scheduler REST resources and corresponding URIs.

operations.name: listAppointmentSlots
operations.description: Retrieves a list of available appointment time slots for a resource based on given work type group or work type and service territories.

operations.name: listAppointmentCandidates
operations.description: Retrieves a list of service resources (appointment candidates) based on work type group or work type and service territories.

connections.name: salesforcerest
connections.description: Connection for using the Salesforce REST API.
